INSERT INTO c_interaction_statistic (uid, type, view_count) VALUES
(#{statistic.uid}, #{statistic.type}, #{statistic.viewCount})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE view_count = view_count + VALUES(view_count)
mapper.select: SELECT mt.*, pu.domain, pu.avatar_url, pu.`level`, pu.industry, pu.location, pu.`status`, cis.view_count, cis.like_count, cis.comment_count FROM ( SELECT bh.uid, bh.history_date, bh.target_id, bh.target_type, bh.update_time, CASE bh.target_type WHEN '1' THEN ca.user_id WHEN '2' THEN cc.user_id WHEN '3' THEN ce.user_id ELSE NULL END user_id, CASE bh.target_type WHEN '1' THEN ca.uri WHEN '2' THEN cc.uri ELSE NULL END uri, CASE bh.target_type WHEN '1' THEN ca.title WHEN '2' THEN cc.title WHEN '3' THEN ce.title ELSE NULL END title, CASE bh.target_type WHEN '1' THEN ca.summary WHEN '2' THEN cc.synopsis WHEN '3' THEN ce.preview_content ELSE NULL END content FROM p_browse_history bh INNER JOIN c_article ca ON bh.target_type = '1' AND bh.target_id = ca.uid INNER JOIN c_column cc ON bh.target_type = '2' AND bh.target_id = cc.uid INNER JOIN c_essay ce ON bh.target_type = '3' AND bh.target_id = ce.uid WHERE bh.user_id = 1 ORDER BY bh.update_time DESC LIMIT 0, 100 ) mt LEFT JOIN p_user pu ON mt.user_id = pu.uid LEFT JOIN c_interaction_statistic cis ON mt.target_id = cis.uid
